text:
Is there a short guide on how to deploy a Franklin website not using github/gitlab/netlify?

I tried just copying the __site directory after calling `optimize()` , but the result is just the raw HTML, it is missing all formatting and the links are all broken. I feel like there is a crucial step I am missing!

elements.text:

I tried just copying the __site directory after calling
, but the result is just the raw HTML, it is missing all formatting and the links are all broken. I feel like there is a crucial step I am missing!

text: You should be able to do just that. Does everything look correct if you run an http server with that folder as root?

elements.text: You should be able to do just that. Does everything look correct if you run an http server with that folder as root?

text:
`import LiveServer; cd("__site"); LiveServer.serve()`

also check your `prepath...` setting; if your base URL is `<http://www.site.com|www.site.com>` then you should just leave `prepath` empty.

Otherwise, please look at the generated `index.html` and send us the first few lines of it so we can see what the links look like

text: ok please add `@def prepath = "~pjentsch"`  to `config.md` and re-do what you did
the `prepath` will be prepended to all your links (at `optimize` pass)
